name: Adzip Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
description: In 2022, Adzip was born out of a deep understanding of the challenges faced by enterprises in the ever-evolving MarTech landscape. With rising customer acquisition costs and shrinking marketing budgets due to the pandemic, CMOs were in search of innovative ways to optimize their marketing initiatives and achieve business goals. Recognizing the potential of brand partnerships and co-campaign opportunities, we set out to provide a technology-led solution. Driven by the mission to help businesses hack growth and expand their brand visibility within limited budgets, we developed the Adzip platform. Our cloud-based SAAS solution empowers brand partners and channel partners to collaborate and create joint social and digital ad campaigns with an integrated storyline. Through our AI-powered algorithm, we offer intelligent recommendations for selecting the right ad partners, ensuring anti-competitiveness, complementary products or services, target customer segmentation, and budget alignment

enhanced_description: Adzip Technologies Pvt. Ltd., launched in 2020, is a cloud-based SAAS platform designed to address challenges in the MarTech landscape by optimizing marketing initiatives and achieving business growth. Born from an understanding of rising customer acquisition costs and shrinking marketing budgets, Adzip aims to help enterprises hack growth and expand brand visibility within limited budgets. The platform empowers brand and channel partners to collaborate on joint social and digital ad campaigns with integrated storylines. Utilizing an AI-powered algorithm, it offers intelligent recommendations for selecting the right ad partners, ensuring anti-competitiveness, complementary products or services, target customer segmentation, and budget alignment. Adzip provides features such as full API integration, ads design templates, and efficient analytics, delivering an AI-led solution to reduce costs, boost reach, and get results.
